$schema.description: The JSON schema for this file

$schemaVersion.description: The version of the JSON schema for this file

autoFix.description: When true, checksync will attempt to apply fixes to an errors

comments.description: An array of the strings that identify the starts of comments in the files being parsed

dryRun.description: When true, checksync will not write any files

excludeGlobs.description: An array of globs that identify files to exclude from the checks

includeGlobs.description: An array of globs that identify files to include in the checks

ignoreFiles.description: An array of globs that identify .gitignore-style files that specify files to be ignored

json.description: When true, checksync output will be as JSON

rootMarker.description: The string that identifies the root of the project from which all sync-tags are relative
